name: MVC
description: MVC is an architectural pattern that structures a codebase in three distinct sections, according to a software design philosophy known as the separation of concerns

name: Express
description: Express is the most widely used Node.js server framework. It allows developers to quickly and easily establish  API routes and associated HTTP request methods.

name: Node
description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside of a web browser.
